text: Jean Reno (born Juan Moreno y Herrera-Jiménez on July 30, 1948)Biography for Jean Reno - IMDb is a French-Spanish actor, he has appeared in many successful movies such as Crimson Rivers, Godzilla, The Da Vinci Code, Mission: Impossible, Ronin, The Pink Panther, and Léon: The Professional. He was born in Casablanca, Morocco on July 30, 1948. He was married to Genevieve Reno from 1977 until they divorced in 1995. Then he married Nathalie Dyszkiewicz from 1996 until they divorced in 2001. He is currently married to Zofia Borucka since 2006. His career began in 1979. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:People from Casablanca Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish stage actors Category:Spanish voice actors Category:French stage actors Category:French voice actors Category:Moroccan actors
title: Jean Reno
